title: The Life cycle of a sawfly
brief_description: A study of the hawthorn sawfly from the laying of the eggs between the surface of tow leaves to the final emergence of the adult insect. The gooseberry sawfly and the hawthorn sawfly are both studied.
description: A study of the hawthorn sawfly from the laying of the eggs between the surface of tow leaves to the final emergence of the adult insect. The gooseberry sawfly and the hawthorn sawfly are both studied.
